original: 佛說現報當受經🔽政一人獨行。而無伴侶。即問之言。姊今何🔽故顏容媚麗。焦悴如此。為何所苦。時女答言。
analyzed: 佛說現報當受經 政一人獨行。而無伴侶。即問之言。姊今何 故顏容媚麗。焦悴如此。為何所苦。時女答言。
translated: Sūtra on the Present Retribution to be Received in the Future

The one person was walking alone, without a companion. He asked her, saying, Sister, why is it that your appearance is so beautiful and radiant, yet so haggard and withered? What are you suffering from? At that time, the woman replied, I am of little merit.
When I married, I obtained a husband.
I hoped he would protect me.
But I did not expect that in one day he would become ill and die.
My in-laws buried me alive in the tomb.
It has been seven days.
A group of thieves robbed the tomb.
They wanted to seek wealth.
They took me back home.
They accepted me as their wife.
Later, the leader of the thieves robbed a village.

analyzed: 為他所殺。 收斂屍骸。
translated: He was killed by others.
The remains were collected and buried.
My relatives took me again.
And buried me alive again.
It has been three days.
Again, I became a wild fox.
It wanted to eat the corpse.
It came to the tomb and covered it.
I was able to escape from it.
The parents and relatives did not know or hear about it.
At that time, the son of the elder said to the woman:
My wife has just died.
Since you have no husband,
the two of us can now be husband and wife.
Is that possible?
At that time, the woman had nowhere to go,
so she agreed.
They went to the house together.
They loved each other.
After one year, she gave birth to a son.
Later, she gave birth to another son.
Later, she became pregnant again.
When she was about to give birth,
the son of the elder went out to play.
He drank with his companions.
When it was dark, he returned.
His wife firmly closed the door.
She gave birth to a child on the ground.
Blood and gore were all over the place.
The husband called out to his wife.
His wife was sitting on the ground with the newborn child.
Blood and gore were all over the place.
She could not open the door.
The husband called out but got no response.
He drew his sword and broke down the door.
He immediately asked his wife,
When I went out this morning,
I told you to call me when I returned.
You closed the door and did not respond.
What is the reason for this?
His wife replied to her husband,
Because I gave birth to a child, blood and gore were everywhere.
The husband said to his wife,
Where is the child you gave birth to now?

original: 其妻即將所生之子授與其夫。
analyzed: 其妻即將所生之子授與其夫。
translated: His wife then took the child she had given birth to and handed it to her husband.

original: 夫得此子即用生蘇煎煮。
analyzed: 夫得此子即用生蘇煎煮。
translated: When the husband got the child, he boiled it in fresh butter.
He forced his wife to eat it.
The wife could not bear to eat it.
She then drew a sharp knife and was about to take her own life.
The wife, fearing for her life, then ate the child.
She finished it all in one sitting.
By the time dawn broke, her husband woke up from his drunken stupor.
He asked his wife,
When I returned last night,
I must have made a mistake while drunk and confused.
His wife replied to her husband,
When you returned last night,
you called out to me to open the door.
Because I had just given birth, I did not open the door in time.
You broke down the door and entered, and then asked me,
What is the difference in feelings?
I reply to you, sir.
For the sake of giving birth to a child, blood and milk are scattered.
You then ask me for the child I gave birth to.
I hand it over to you, sir.

original: 君得此子即用生蘇煎煮。
analyzed: 君得此子即用生蘇煎煮。
translated: When you get this child, you immediately use it to cook and boil milk.
You set a limit for me to eat it.
I cannot bear to eat it.
You then draw your sword and want to kill me.
I eat the child to the end for the sake of greedily saving my life.
When the husband heard this,
he immediately lowered his head.
He was extremely ashamed and embarrassed.
He apologized to his wife,
saying that his drunkenness was a mistake.
He asked her not to hold it against him.
From now on, he vowed never to drink alcohol again.
Later, the wife said to her husband,
Since I parted with my parents,
years and months have passed, and I have no news of them.
The two of us, together with our two children,
will go to our parents' home to pay our respects and ask about their well-being.

original: 時長者子即共其妻并及二子隨路而去。
analyzed: 時長者子即共其妻并及二子隨路而去。
translated: At that time, the elder's son then went with his wife and two children along the road.
It was the hottest time of the year.
Her husband stopped under a tree.
Avoiding the heat, he fell asleep.

original: 忽為黑蛇螫夫即死。🔽其妻啼哭。
analyzed: 忽為黑蛇螫夫即死。 其妻啼哭。
translated: Suddenly, he was bitten by a black snake and died.
His wife cried and held their two children, then continued on the road.
They encountered a deep pit of water.
It was long and difficult to cross.
Guang sent the elder child to the other side of the shore.
Just as he was about to turn back to welcome the younger child,
The child saw his mother and threw himself into the water.
He was drowned by the waves.
He went up to the shore again to hold the elder child,
But he was eaten by tigers and wolves.
At that time, the woman called out to heaven and earth.
What bad karma have I encountered to suffer like this?
She then continued on and saw her parents' home.
The acquaintances in the village asked her,

original: 見我父母兄弟眷屬悉平安不。
analyzed: 見我父母兄弟眷屬悉平安不。
translated: Have you seen my parents, brothers, and relatives? Are they all safe?
The acquaintances replied,
Your house caught fire.

original: 大小悉皆為火燒殺並無人在。
analyzed: 大小悉皆為火燒殺並無人在。
translated: both large and small, were all burned to death by fire, and there were no survivors.
At that time, the woman heard this.
She became even more confused and had nowhere to go.

original: 爾時世尊為諸大眾說微妙法。
analyzed: 爾時世尊為諸大眾說微妙法。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One expounded the subtle Dharma for the great assembly.
He immediately used his heavenly eye to observe this woman.
He then told Ānanda,
You should take a jeweled robe to welcome this woman.

original: 阿難受教將以寶衣迎此女人。
analyzed: 阿難受教將以寶衣迎此女人。
translated: Ānanda received the instruction and took a jeweled robe to welcome the woman.
She came to the assembly.
She bowed to the World-Honored One.
She was ashamed and repented.
The Buddha expounded the Dharma for her.
She severed all bonds and defilements and attained the fruit of arhatship.
The Buddha also told the entire great assembly,

original: 汝等欲知此女前世之善惡事者。
analyzed: 汝等欲知此女前世之善惡事者。
translated: If you wish to know the good and evil events of this woman's past life,
listen carefully and contemplate it well.
Be careful not to forget it.

original: 乃於過世無數劫時有長者子。
analyzed: 乃於過世無數劫時有長者子。
translated: In the past, countless eons ago, there was a son of a wealthy elder.
His wealth was immeasurable.
He took a wife.
After several years, they still had no children.

original: 時長者子即自思惟。🔽我今財富并無兒子。
analyzed: 時長者子即自思惟。 我今財富并無兒子。
translated: At that time, the elder's son thought to himself:🔽I am now wealthy but have no son.
If I suddenly die, there will be no one to inherit my wealth.
Later, he took a concubine.
After a year, she gave birth to a boy.
His face was handsome.
The elder loved him dearly.
At that time, the elder wife thought to herself:
As the elder wife, I have no son.
It has not been many years since I took in a concubine.
She has given birth to a boy.
If he grows up, the wealth will belong to him.
I will certainly be abandoned by my husband.

original: 我今宜應設諸方計殺此小兒。
analyzed: 我今宜應設諸方計殺此小兒。
translated: I should now devise a plan to kill this child.
At that time, the concubine's mother went out and was not at home.

original: 而是大妻內計以定即用鐵針二枚刺兒顋上。
analyzed: 而是大妻內計以定即用鐵針二枚刺兒顋上。
translated: The elder wife, having made up her mind, used two iron needles to prick the child's jaw.
The child cried in pain, unable to speak.
The concubine's mother held the child, not knowing where it hurt.
She called out to heaven and earth.

original: 若有惡心瞋心疾心妬心殺我子者。
analyzed: 若有惡心瞋心疾心妬心殺我子者。
translated: If anyone with an evil mind, an angry mind, a resentful mind, or a jealous mind kills my child,

original: 令其生生世世還受苦報。
analyzed: 令其生生世世還受苦報。
translated: May they in life after life receive the painful retribution.
At that time, the elder wife's mind was pure and clear.

original: 即於夫前及於妾前而立呪誓。
analyzed: 即於夫前及於妾前而立呪誓。
translated: She then made a vow in front of her husband and the concubine:

original: 我若惡心嗔心嫉心妬心殺汝子者。
analyzed: 我若惡心嗔心嫉心妬心殺汝子者。
translated: If I kill your child with an evil mind, an angry mind, an envious mind, or a jealous mind,

original: 令我生生世世還受女身。
analyzed: 令我生生世世還受女身。
translated: May I in life after life still receive a female body.
After marrying my husband, may I be buried alive in a tomb.

original: 令我生生世世若生兒者。
analyzed: 令我生生世世若生兒者。
translated: May I in life after life, if I give birth to a son,
Cook him with fresh butter and eat him.

original: 令我生生世世夫為蛇螫。
analyzed: 令我生生世世夫為蛇螫。
translated: May I in life after life, have my husband bitten by a snake,
My child drowned, and my son eaten by a tiger.

original: 闔家大小悉皆為火之所燒殺。
analyzed: 闔家大小悉皆為火之所燒殺。
translated: May the entire family, young and old, all be burned to death by fire.
After making the vow, the child immediately died.

original: 是時大妻心自忓清而立呪誓言。
analyzed: 是時大妻心自忓清而立呪誓言。
translated: At that time, the elder wife's mind was pure and clear, and she made a vow, saying:

original: 無罪福如影隨形不相放捨。
analyzed: 無罪福如影隨形不相放捨。
translated: Without sin or merit, like a shadow following a form, not letting go of each other.
And this elder wife, for five hundred lifetimes,
She will always experience suffering in her next life.
The Buddha also told the great assembly:
Now I will tell you,

original: 此女人前世之時修何功德。
analyzed: 此女人前世之時修何功德。
translated: What merits did this woman cultivate in her past life?
And why did she meet me?
And covered her with clothes.

original: 為其說法斷諸結漏得羅漢道時。
analyzed: 為其說法斷諸結漏得羅漢道時。
translated: And for her, spoke the Dharma, severed her afflictions, and attained the path of arhatship.

original: 此女人於過去世無量劫時。
analyzed: 此女人於過去世無量劫時。
translated: At that time, this woman in a past life, countless eons ago,
Was extremely poor.
There was a pratyekabuddha.
Who taught and transformed her.
This woman had no money.
She untied her belt and gave it to the pratyekabuddha.

original: 由是因緣所生端政恒生富家。
analyzed: 由是因緣所生端政恒生富家。
translated: By this cause and condition, she was reborn with a beautiful appearance and always in a wealthy family.

original: 雖復受如前苦於五百世還得值我。
analyzed: 雖復受如前苦於五百世還得值我。
translated: Although she again experienced the suffering as before for five hundred lifetimes, she still met me.
And covered her with clothes.

original: 為其說法斷諸結漏得羅漢道。
analyzed: 為其說法斷諸結漏得羅漢道。
translated: And for her, spoke the Dharma, severed her afflictions, and attained the path of arhatship.

original: 雖復得道一日六時常苦熱鐵。
analyzed: 雖復得道一日六時常苦熱鐵。
translated: Although she attained the path, for six periods of the day, she always suffered from red-hot iron.
Entering from the top of her head, it penetrated her heart.
The Buddha also told the great assembly:

original: 從今已往慎勿惡心瞋心妬心。
analyzed: 從今已往慎勿惡心瞋心妬心。
translated: From now on, be careful not to have evil, angry, or jealous thoughts.
Do not kill each other again, nor curse each other.

original: 言無罪報如影隨形終不放捨。
analyzed: 言無罪報如影隨形終不放捨。
translated: Words have retribution, like a shadow following a form, and will never be let go.

original: 作善作惡得惡終無我作他人受報身。
analyzed: 作善作惡得惡終無我作他人受報身。
translated: If one does good or evil, one will receive the retribution oneself, and no one else can take one's place.
Although good and evil may be destroyed, they do not rot.
As explained above, you should accept and uphold it.

original: 爾時大眾及諸天龍八部鬼神有惡心者。
analyzed: 爾時大眾及諸天龍八部鬼神有惡心者。
translated: At that time, among the great assembly and the eight groups of gods, dragons, and spirits, those with evil thoughts
all gave rise to compassion.
Hearing what the Buddha said, they accepted and upheld it with their heads.
The Sutra on the Retribution of Karmic Effects to be Experienced in This Life, in One Scroll
